metadata.name: PowerShell Base64 Encoded IEX Cmdlet
metadata.comment: Detects usage of a base64 encoded "IEX" cmdlet in a process command line

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('suvyichb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lfwcaow')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jrvggkf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('awv4ichb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('llecaow')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pzxggkf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('awv4ichozx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('llecaotmv3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pzxggke5ld')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('suvyichozx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lfwcaotmv3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jrvggke5ld')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('suvykf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lfwchb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jrvgow')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('awv4kf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('llechb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pzxgow')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('awv4ke5ld')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('llechozx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pzxgotmv3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('suvyke5ld')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lfwchozx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jrvgotmv3')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('suvykcgn')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lfwcgoj')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jrvgokc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('awv4kcgn')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('llecgoj')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pzxgokc'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sqbfafgaiaaoafsa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('karqbyacaakabba')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jaeuawaagacgaww')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aqblahgaiaaoafsa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kazqb4acaakabba')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paguaeaagacgaww')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aqblahgaiaaoae4azqb3a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kazqb4acaakaboaguadw')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('paguaeaagacgatgblahca')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sqbfafgaiaaoae4azqb3a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('karqbyacaakaboaguadw')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jaeuawaagacgatgblahca'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of a base64 encoded "IEX" cmdlet in a process command line

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
